getSupportedTLDSet

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSupportedTLDSet()
Get a list of supported TLDs. The result set contains dots and hyphens for the appropriate suffixes. e.g. '.eu.org' or '-sixxs'.

Returns:
Gets a set of supported top level domains.

getTLD

public static java.lang.String getTLD(java.lang.String name)
Extract the TLD from the given name.

Parameters:
name - A domain name.
Returns:

getServer

public static WhoisServer getServer(java.lang.String name)
Get the WhoisServer for the given name.

Parameters:
name - A domain name.
Returns:
An initalised WhoisServer instance that can query the given name.

query

public static WhoisResponse query(java.lang.String name)
                           throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                  java.io.IOException
Query the given domain name. Calls WhoisServer.query(String).

Parameters:
name - A domain name.
Returns:
A {@link WhoisResponse] instance for this query.
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException
java.io.IOException
